courseDetails.title: SQL практикум для начинающих и продолжающих
courseDetails.shortDescription: Спроектируем базу данных популярного мессенджера и научимся писать все виды запросов к ней (видео, тесты, SQL-задачи)
courseDetails.longDescription:
У данного курса также есть бесплатная краткая версия (первые 2 часа видео). Ее можно найти в профиле автора.


SQL - это сложно, непонятно? Вовсе нет!

Язык запросов к базам данных - вполне себе логичный и интуитивно понятный язык.

И в данном курсе мы обязательно убедимся этом.


При этом знание баз данных нужно абсолютно всем АйТишникам: и программистам, и тестировщикам, и аналитикам, и даже менеджерам... Все понимают, что SQL - очень востребованный навык в нашей индустрии.


Это исключительно практический курс. Мы спроектируем базу данных популярного мессенджера и научимся писать запросы к ней. Обсудим вопросы взаимодействия с сервером, начиная с установки рабочего окружения и закончим командами набора DDL и DML. Научимся писать все виды типовых запросов.


Кому может быть полезен этот курс:

  • Новичкам - Отличная возможность познакомиться с базами данных и языком SQL на живом примере

  • Студентам - Получите отличную практику проектирования БД и написания запросов к ней

  • ИТ-специалистам - Расширите и структурируете свои знания в SQL, закроете пробелы. Получите +1 проект в портфолио


Чему можно научиться в курсе:

  • Проектировать БД - Обсудим подробно на конкретном примере набор команд DDL (data definition language)

  • Писать SQL запросы - Будем практиковаться с разными видами запросов к базе данных

  • Взаимодействовать с сервером - На примере базы MySQL данных научимся типовым операциям на сервере БД


Попробуйте! Если что-то пойдет не так, то Вы знаете, что платформа Udemy гарантирует 30-дневную возможность вернуть деньги за курс.

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma of CIO Chief Information Officer
courseDetails.shortDescription: Executive Diploma of CIO Chief Information Officer by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Executive Diploma of CIO Chief Information Officer by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Chief Information Officer (CIO) plays a crucial role in modern organizations, especially in those heavily reliant on technology. The role and functionality of a CIO encompass a wide range of responsibilities aimed at leveraging technology to achieve business objectives. Here's an overview:


Strategic Planning: The CIO is responsible for aligning the organization's technological resources with its overall business strategy. This involves understanding the company's goals and objectives and developing a roadmap for how technology can support and enhance them.


Technology Infrastructure Management: The CIO oversees the management of the organization's IT infrastructure, including hardware, software, networks, and data centers. This includes ensuring the reliability, security, and scalability of the infrastructure to support the company's operations.


Information Security: Protecting the organization's data and information systems from cyber threats is a critical responsibility of the CIO. This involves implementing security measures, policies, and procedures to safeguard against breaches, hacking attempts, and other security risks.


Digital Transformation: The CIO plays a key role in driving digital transformation initiatives within the organization. This may involve implementing new technologies, such as cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and big data analytics, to streamline processes, improve efficiency, and enhance the customer experience.


Vendor Management: Many organizations rely on third-party vendors for various IT services and solutions. The CIO is responsible for selecting and managing these vendors, ensuring they deliver value and meet the organization's needs.


Budgeting and Cost Management: The CIO oversees the IT budget, allocating resources effectively to support the organization's strategic objectives while managing costs and maximizing ROI.


Team Leadership: The CIO leads the IT department, providing direction, guidance, and support to IT staff to ensure they have the necessary skills and resources to perform their roles effectively.


Stakeholder Communication: The CIO acts as a bridge between the IT department and other business units, communicating effectively with senior management and stakeholders to ensure alignment between IT initiatives and overall business goals.


In terms of key advice for building a career with an impact on business results, a CIO should focus on the following:


Business Acumen: Develop a deep understanding of the organization's business model, industry trends, and competitive landscape. This will enable you to align IT initiatives with business objectives and demonstrate the value of technology to the company's bottom line.


Relationship Building: Build strong relationships with senior management, department heads, and other stakeholders across the organization. Effective communication and collaboration are essential for gaining buy-in for IT projects and driving successful outcomes.


Innovation and Agility: Embrace innovation and adopt an agile mindset to respond quickly to changing business needs and technological advancements. Look for opportunities to leverage emerging technologies to drive innovation and create competitive advantages for the organization.


Risk Management: Prioritize cybersecurity and risk management efforts to protect the organization's assets and reputation. Stay abreast of evolving threats and implement proactive measures to mitigate risks effectively.


Continuous Learning: The field of technology is constantly evolving, so it's crucial to stay current with the latest trends, tools, and best practices. Invest in ongoing learning and professional development to keep your skills sharp and remain at the forefront of industry advancements.


By focusing on these areas, a CIO can build a successful career that not only advances their own professional goals but also makes a significant impact on the business results and overall success of the company.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career as CIO/CTO or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página de Ventas Para Hotmart 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página de ventas para Hotmart, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA DE VENTAS PARA HOTMART Y AUMENTAR TUS INGRESOS POR MARKETING DE AFILIACIÓN?


Hotmart es una plataforma de venta de cursos modelo Marketplace, fundada en 2011. Con más de 7 millones de usuarios en todo el mundo y transacciones que superan los mil millones de dólares anuales. Se ha consolidado como el líder en ventas de infoproductos en Latinoamérica y mundialmente solo detrás de Udemy.


Actualmente Hotmart tiene más de 420,000 infoproductos registrados, más de 30 millones de usuarios registrados y presencia en más de 190 países.

Esta plataforma consigue ganar dinero a través del cobro por comisiones por la venta de cada curso.


La principal diferencia de Hotmart respecto a otras plataformas para venta de cursos modelo MarketPlace, es que Hotmart cuenta con una estructura un poco más compleja, y tiene más variables en juego, siendo la más relevante y diferencial «el afiliado».

El afiliado se encarga de promocionar y vender los infoproductos de Hotmart, solucionando así uno de los principales problemas de los creadores de contenidos, así es hablamos de las ventas.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestra página de ventas en WordPress, utilizando los temas y opciones de diseño que nos brinda el constructor visual, que llevarán su página de ventas al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página de ventas en WordPress, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su página de ventas diseñada con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu página de ventas.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear páginas de ventas con WordPress y Elementor desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu página de ventas de forma profesional.

  • Cómo adaptar tu página de ventas para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página de Ventas Para Hotmart", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 175,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear una página de ventas con WordPress y Elementor de forma rápida y sencilla.



¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender en la plataforma de WordPress y en el constructor visual de Elementor.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca

courseDetails.title: Unlock Fluent English: Master Idioms for Rapid Communication
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn essential idioms to boost your English fluency, improve business communication, and sound like a native speaker
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you want to sound more fluent, confident, and natural when speaking English?

If you often find yourself struggling to understand or use common English expressions in conversations, this course is for you. In this practical and engaging course by Tango Lingo, you’ll master essential English idioms that are widely used in professional and everyday communication.

Idioms are the secret weapon to sounding like a native speaker. They add color, emotion, and impact to your speech and writing. Whether you're participating in business meetings, writing professional emails, chatting with friends, or networking at events, idioms will make your English more authentic and engaging.


What you’ll learn:

  • Master essential idioms commonly used in business, casual conversations, and daily situations.

  • Understand the meaning, tone, and proper usage of idioms in both formal (workplace, interviews, presentations) and informal (social gatherings, friendly chats) contexts.

  • Learn how to integrate idioms smoothly into your speech and writing, making you sound more natural and confident.

  • Boost your English fluency and comprehension by learning idioms in context with practical examples and real-life scenarios.

By the end of this course, you’ll no longer hesitate when you hear or want to use idioms in conversations. Instead, you’ll be ready to apply them effectively to stand out and connect better with native and non-native English speakers alike.


Why take this course?

This course is perfect for:

  • ESL (English as a Second Language) learners who want to enhance their fluency and vocabulary.

  • Business professionals who need to sound more polished and confident in the workplace.

  • Students and travelers who wish to navigate English-speaking environments with ease.

  • Anyone who wants to elevate their communication skills by mastering idiomatic expressions.

We believe learning English should be fun, interactive, and practical. Our step-by-step approach helps you fully understand each idiom, while exercises and real-life examples ensure you can apply them right away.

Join us at Tango Lingo and start speaking English the way it’s really used!
targetAudiences: ESL (English as a Second Language) learners who want to improve their English fluency and speak more naturally.
Business professionals aiming to enhance their business English and sound more confident in meetings, interviews, and workplace conversations.
Students, job seekers, and travelers looking to elevate both formal and informal communication.
Anyone who wants to upgrade their English speaking and writing by mastering frequently used idioms for daily life and work.
